Home.title: Leading the way in
Home.third: Medicine has been constantly transformed by technological innovation, with Artificial Intelligence (AI) standing out as one of the main tools for optimizing diagnoses and treatments.
Home.four: In an unprecedented advancement, the world's first AI system has been developed and certified, with scientific information validated by the most respected professionals globally, dedicated to assisting in the diagnosis and treatment of peritoneal carcinomatosis, a complex and challenging oncological condition.
